comments.author: Matt
comments.body: I'll have to pass on the ride today. I have a lunch appointment with some sushi and a wonderful young lady. Enjoy your ride!

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: I have to skip today's ride also... I'm having lunch w/ Matt and his wonderful young friend. You don't mind do you Matt?

comments.author: Matt
comments.body: Dave, you and I are normally the bosomest of buddies on two wheels. However, I must admit that I do not need competition from the likes of you when it comes to cavorting with the ladies on my lunch hour. We have seen what happens when you doff your shirt in the presence of the 21-to-29 crowd. Be a friend and stay as far away from my game as possible today, mkay?

comments.author: Dennis
comments.body: I think DU is on to a good idea, provide Matt with Chaperone services for a free lunch. Count me in. DMM

comments.author: Greg
comments.body: As usual, I have a regularly scheduled 1 pm meeting today that will preclude me from joining the ride. But on the bright side, I think I can squeeze in lunch with Matt!
